psi

Class PsiClientKeyDescription

  • java.lang.Object
    • psi.PsiClientKeyDescription
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, PsiKeyDescription

    public class PsiClientKeyDescription
extends java.lang.Object
implements PsiKeyDescription, java.io.Serializable
    Contains the variables used by the client to perform encryption operations. The set of variables is a superset of the ones required by each psi implementation. In particular:
    • DH uses modulus and clientPrivateExponent
    • BS uses modulus and serverPublicExponent
    • ECDH uses ecClientPrivateD
    • ECBS uses ecServerPublicQ
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
